contents.contents: Retrace your steps and turn left into the Aligre Boulevard.
In the past, there were ramparts in the place of the present boulevard. Can you see the river that flows along the boulevard? It is called “the Fausse-Rivière”.

choices: It is not real water that flows
Because it was dug by men

explanations.contents: Actually, it was dug by men as a means to avoid flooding, so it is not natural.
